info.description: This is a service for running FRCS on a harvest unit in California, funded by California Energy Commission.
info.title: Fuel Reduction Cost Simulator Web Service

post.description:
| Limits | Ground-Based Mech WT | Ground-Based CTL | Ground-Based Manual WT | Ground-Based Manual Log | Cable Manual WT/Log | Cable Manual WT | Cable Manual Log | Cable CTL | Helicopter Manual Log | Helicopter CTL |
|-|:-:|:-:|:-:|:-:|:-:|:-:|:-:|:-:|:-:|:-:|
| TreeVol Max CT, ft3 | 80 | 80 | 80 | 80 | 80 | 80 | 80 | 80 | 80 | 80 |
| TreeVol Max SLT, ft3 | 80 | 80 | 80 | 80 | 80 | 80 | 80 | 80 | 80 | 80 |
| TreeVol Max LLT, ft3 | 250 |  | 250 | 250 | 250 | 250 | 250 |  | 250 |  |
| Max LLT/ac |  | 10 |  |  |  |  |  | 10 |  | 10 |
| Max LLT as % of ALT |  | 10 |  |  |  |  |  | 10 |  | 10 |
| Max slope, % | 40 | 40 | 40 | 40 | 100 | 100 | 100 | 40 | 100 | 40 |
| Max Yarding Dist, ft |  |  |  |  | 1300 | 1300 | 1300 | 1300 | 10000 | 10000 |

system.description: Select from a list of 10 types of harvesting systems.

isPartialCut.description: Indicate the type of harvest: if true, partial-cut; otherwise clear-cut.

deliverToLandingDistance.description: Average distance in feet that logs or trees are delivered to the landing. For ground-based and cable systems this is measured along the slope.

slope.description: The average fall-line slope for the harvest unit, measured as a percentage.

elevation.description: elevation in feet is required for helicopter systems.

includeLoadingCosts.description: Indicate whether the costs of fuel loading needs to be included.

includeMoveInCosts.description: Indicate whether the costs of moving equipment to the harvesting unit needs to be included.

area.description: area in acres of one harvest unit if this is the only unit in a treatment contract or timber; area in acres of the combined harvest units if multiple units that would likely be harvested together are close enough to drive equipment between them.

moveInDistance.description: One-way move-in distance in miles that equipment is transported to reach the harvest unit.

includeCostsCollectChipResidues.description: Indicate whether the costs of collecting and chipping residues needs to be included.

woodDensityCT.description: User specified green wood density of chip trees in pounds per cubic feet.

woodDensitySLT.description: User specified green wood density of small log trees in pounds per cubic feet.

woodDensityLLT.description: User specified green wood density of large log trees in pounds per cubic feet.

residueFractionCT.description: User specified residue fraction of chip trees.

residueFractionSLT.description: User specified residue fraction of small log trees.

residueFractionLLT.description: User specified residue fraction of large log trees.

hardwoodFractionCT.description: User specified hardwood fraction of chip trees.

hardwoodFractionSLT.description: User specified hardwood fraction of small log trees.

hardwoodFractionLLT.description: User specified hardwood fraction of large log trees.

treesPerAcreCT.description: Number of harvested chip trees per acre.

volumeCT.description: Tree volume of harvested chip trees in cubic feet per tree.

treesPerAcreSLT.description: Number of harvested small log trees per acre.

volumeSLT.description: Tree volume of harvested small log trees in cubic feet per tree.

treesPerAcreLLT.description: Number of harvested large log trees per acre.

volumeLLT.description: Tree volume of harvested large log trees in cubic feet per tree.

dieselFuelPrice.description: California On-Highway Diesel Fuel Price in dollars per gallon.

moistureContent.description: Moisture Content of Biomass Feedstock on a wet basis, Proportion of residues recovered in the WT systems, measured as a percentage

isBiomassSalvage.description: Indicate whether all trees (including log trees) are chipped.

laborBenefits.description: Ratio of benefits and other payroll costs to labor costs, measured as a percentage

residueRecovFracWT.description: Proportion of residues recovered in the WT systems, measured as a percentage

residueRecovFracCTL.description: Proportion of residues recovered in CTL system, measured as a percentage

yieldPerAcre.description: Total Yield in Green Tons per Acre.

costPerAcre.description: Total Logging Cost in US dollars per Acre.

costPerBoleCCF.description: Total Logging Cost in US dollars per Hundred Cubic Feet.

costPerGT.description: Total Logging Cost in US dollars per Green Ton.

dieselPerAcre.description: Total Diesel Consumption in Gallons per Acre.

dieselPerBoleCCF.description: Total Diesel Consumption in Gallons per Hundred Cubic Feet.

gasolinePerAcre.description: Total Gasoline Consumption in Gallons per Acre.

gasolinePerBoleCCF.description: Total Gasoline Consumption in Gallons per Hundred Cubic Feet.

jetFuelPerAcre.description: Total Jet Fuel Consumption in Gallons per Acre.

jetFuelPerBoleCCF.description: Total Jet Fuel Consumption in Gallons per Hundred Cubic Feet.

yieldPerAcre.description: Yield of Residual Woody Biomass in Green Tons per Acre.

costPerAcre.description: Cost of Harvesting Residual Woody Biomass in US dollars per Acre.

costPerBoleCCF.description: Cost of Harvesting Residual Woody Biomass in US dollars per Hundred Cubic Feet.

costPerGT.description: Cost of Harvesting Residual Woody Biomass in US dollars per Green Ton.

dieselPerAcre.description: Diesel Consumption of Harvesting Residual Woody Biomass in Gallons per Acre.

dieselPerBoleCCF.description: Diesel Consumption of Harvesting Residual Woody Biomass in Gallons per Hundred Cubic Feet.

gasolinePerAcre.description: Gasoline Consumption of Harvesting Residual Woody Biomass in Gallons per Acre.

gasolinePerBoleCCF.description: Gasoline Consumption of Harvesting Residual Woody Biomass in Gallons per Hundred Cubic Feet.

jetFuelPerAcre.description: Jet Fuel Consumption of Harvesting Residual Woody Biomass in Gallons per Acre.

jetFuelPerBoleCCF.description: Jet Fuel Consumption of Harvesting Residual Woody Biomass in Gallons per Hundred Cubic Feet.
